name: stem-project-monorepo-root
description: Deep Learning With Love - Integrated Learning Platform with AI

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd stem-project && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: npm install && cd stem-project && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cd api && npm install
scripts.ai:setup: cd ai_engine && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python init_db.py
scripts.postinstall: cd stem-project && npm install && cd ../stem-project/backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf stem-project/build stem-project/node_modules stem-project/backend/node_modules ai_engine/__pycache__ ai_engine/.venv
